title: I don't know of a single high Elo top laner that doesn't complain about trundle
body: Now either I'm lying or everyone that believes he's balanced is low Elo. Laning vs trundle makes me want to claw my eyes out. A champ that buy a Tiamat early but has so much fucking tankiness and sustain and survivability should not be allowed to lane. His ulti is a 1v1 free win. His q is disgusting. His aa base damage is absolutely cancerous. Fervor trundle is why people in the top lane commit suicide. His e can't be countered early game. His w is just not fair. Please do something to this champ

Correct me if I'm wrong but previously he was considered as AD champs counter, since he can effectively drain every useful stat they try to build and utilize it.
Now in this AD and tank meta when AP champions can't do anything meaningful vs tanks, picking Trundle means you counter most of the enemy team. Especially the popular 4-5 ad comps (including support (hi Poppy)).
IMO he just does his job properly, if you want to win lane against him, pick something AP (Liss, Lulu, Heimer, Morg). If they are too weak to punish him, their laning needs buff.

if you use a counter, or you are skilled, no matchup will be hard. I fight hard counters all the time. you have to work around them. And, as the Romans would say, VI VICTA VIS (strength beats strength) to beat a strong, difficult to fight champion, pick your own strong difficult to fight champion. I also pick Nasus into Trundle and wait for him to ult so I can recover my health with my ult and crush him with 4 1100 stack Qs.
He was always like that, underplayed lane bully with shitload of sustain.

I play Azir top into him
kekekeke

Azir ulti counters Trundle Ulti because you just disengage and walk away.
You can dash over his pillar easily.
You can harass him without taking any return damage
You scale harder than him.

Really the only thing hes got late game is a split push, but TP azir can just waveclear for days against that kind of crap, and stalling out the game is a win for Azir anyways.

But yeah, as far as standard picks go I agree Trundle is silly.

Thank god Azir is getting gutted next patch

I have seem trundles shit on quinn and teemo tops, and it happens very commonly.

Teemo actually is quite good against Trundle, except he has to be very aggresive to make it work otherwise his passive will just nullify Teemo's poke. Quinn on the other hand is pretty weak at the moment in most peoples eyes, and Trundle can just beat her to death if her E is on CD.

Teemo can only bully trundle before he is 6/got some mr.

once he gets 6 or has mr just pull his shit off the ground and beat teemo to death.

If the teemo is good hes got a level advantage on trundle due to him missing minion waves due to backing, and has lots of shrooms out by the time trundle hits six. Trying to all in a teemo that hit six more than 1 minute ahead of you is crazy.

I picked up Trundle a few months ago. He is now the only champion I feel like I can smash a lane with no matter what. His early game is disgusting. If I hit level two first I'm going to pillar behind you and Q you to death or you are going to blow your flash. Every. Game. Now that being said if I am not playing trundle top but someone else, I ban him he is harder to lane against then a lot of other champions. The only person who even remotely gives me trouble is Quinn or Nautilus. But once I get my Titanic and boots I will walk into lane and destroy a Quinn. Playing him though I get camped hard by the enemy jungle. Non stop. Really annoying. He is very strong but not unbeatable. Like a lot of champs.

Because riot made his Ult very strong. Its not just that, he literally shreds 20% armor and magic resist immediately and it turns to 40% on both if you continue to fight him  thus making him regen even more and hitting you even harder. Oh yeah once he puts his ice field = even more health regen. Attack speed already provided so he doesn't need to build any attack speed items at all. Q gives him a decent amount of ad. What Riot needs to do is revert the ult buff. He is one of the strongest dueler out of all top laners. Funny thing is that Tiamat really does nothing except a free aa. its his kit that gives him that tankyness sustain etc.

One perfect nerf for him is to make it so that when he ults, he only gains 25% of the damage dealt as HP and the rest as regen very similar to Mord's Ult. I have seen it so many times where i Ult someone and i get a huge chunk of HP. like 633!

also hes a great team fighter. because of cc. makes your tank usless while becoming practically the most unkillable champion in the game. its way easier to kill an ulting mundo. or even a volibear with his passive up. just stupid

hes hard counters every damn tank and every meta top laner there is. he hardly has any counters. hes annoying as fuck. hes literally the only champion i can never win lane against on my own without junglers help. what point of the game is he weak huh? he scales the longer the game lasts also hes probably the best early game champion in the game fuck darius can't even fight him early game. how stupid for a champion to ult you and run you down under your own turret and your a tank. am silver 1 but this mother fucker is just too much to deal with. fuckin outheals a mundo and 10 times tankier late game
Darius can kind of fight him early game, if he lands his Q's well he can usually win trades... Course once Trundle hits level 6 it's gg lane over.

This matchups has just kept going worse and worse for Darius over the seasons. Before Rework Darius had the upper hand in lane because he could zone with his Q ( which was terrifying back then ) then they reworked Darius and he lost  lots of his lane power. i was still able to beat Trundles after 6 though with a cleaver and a QSS though. Now that QSS doesn't affect his ultimate, Darius is completely powerless against him.
